channel.title: Tech Writing Talks
channel.description: Recent content on Tech Writing Talks

item.title: Docs Code Examples: Test, Extract, Transclude
item.description: If you write documentation for a product that is, itself, code - think SDK, API, or CLI - code is an important part of your documentation!

item.title: Dachary Carey
item.description: Dachary is a Senior Programmer Writer on the Developer Docs team at MongoDB.

item.title: About
item.description: Technical writing is an extremely wide umbrella. Technical writing conferences are few and far between, and they only have so much time for a limited number of talks.

item.title: Elements
item.description: Table Of Contents Heading 2 Heading 3 Emphasis Link Paragraph Ordered List Unordered List Notice Tab Collapse Code and Syntax Highlighting Blockquote Inline HTML Codepen Tables Image Gallery Youtube video Custom video Here is an example of headings.

item.title: Pitch a talk
item.description: The Pitch Tech Writing Talks would love to get your pitches!

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Analytics Tech Writing Talks is organized by an individual who is against invasive analytics tracking.

item.title: Terms And Conditions
item.description: Responsibility of Contributors If you pitch a talk to Tech Writing Talks, you are responsible for guaranteeing that you own the copyright to the content of your talk.
